document_data.name: ''Staff of Silence''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''staff of silence''''' was a [[magic]]al [[staff]] that completely negated any noise made by its bearer.
document_data.Powers:
In addition to negating all sound made by the bearer, a ''staff of silence'' could imbue the bearer with deafness, effectively making them immune to any form of sound-based attack to include any ''[[Power word, banishment|power word]]'' [[spell]]s.

The bearer could release the stored sonic energy of the staff in a focused attack once per day, causing a high-pitched shriek that caused physical harm and deafened and stunned any targets nearby.
document_data.History: The ''staff of silence'' originated in [[Myth Drannor]].
